SEARCH
Package org.example.oopproject1.repository

Interface ApplicationRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Application,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Application,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Application,String>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Application,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Application,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Application>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Application,String>
@Repository public interface ApplicationRepository extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Application,String>
Repository interface for accessing Application entities in MongoDB.

Extends MongoRepository to provide CRUD operations, as well as custom methods for pagination and filtering by job ID, email, and application status.

Since:
1.0
